description: Show organization invoices batch invoice status change details
permissions: Admin users can view all organization invoices batch invoice status changes. Non-admin users can view status changes only for organization invoices batch invoices they are authorized to access; access is delegated through OrganizationInvoicesBatchInvoice scope to OrganizationInvoicesBatch, which allows managers of the organization or members of its broker organization.
validation_notes: id argument is required and must be non-empty.
